title: THANK YOU SO MUCH CLG
body: Way to just absolutely kill it out there. Any by kill it I mean kill NA's reputation. GG FreeLG, I always hated you and your dick riding fans.

replies.body:
some ppl are so mad lol.
guess how i felt in seaosn 4 when kabum kicked eu out of the tournament? i didnt care, elements played cocky and bad so yea :D
still was a good tournament to watch

The only thing killing NA reputation is people like you. NA teams have preformed really well this year, aside from TSM (there is till hope). C9 barely made it into worlds and is currently undefeated, this is CLGs first worlds (and they played the first week very well), and while TSM did not have a great preformance they really showed up in the last game they played and could still do very well. This is the first season in a while where NA hasn't just rolled over, but here you are bitching and whining like a child because one team did poorly today. Who do you really think makes Na look worse?

Wow, you sound like the toxic douchbags I find in ranked that get banned the game after. Either way, you kinda cannot really ruin NA's reputation when we are considered the worst region to attend worlds essentially. And we also have bad games too. Does Fnatic's loss to C9 mean that they officially ruined EU's reputation? No, they messed up. Maybe there is a better team in that group in particular. CLG probably just had a few bad games. I saw some errors they did those games that I have not seen in some time. They lost once and it was downhill from there. 

Overall, if I have gained anything from this, it is that you are a jerk. All the banwagoners (not assuming you are) ditch so fast on the forums....
